By the way I have this stupid dream where we hire some
animator to look over some of our posts and animate
the best parts into a big audio-visual review with
about 5 minutes devoted to each RPer (if you want to
mock me by animating some of my old posts be my
guests, but it comes out of your 5 minutes), but I
doubt that will ever happen.
